attributes.action: enact a requirement that all large stores and supermarkets goods that are approaching a sell-by date retail at drastically reduced prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some (if not most) Supermarkets do offer perishable goods that are within a few days of the optimum storage date at reduced prices, however I am concerned that a)All large stores and Supermarkets are required to dispose of massive amounts of perishable goods each day which if consumed immediately would pose no harm and b)Such supplies (if an enactment were made) could be made far better use of within a short space of logistical time.
